divs: sighting detailsi was in johnston,r.i. traveling south on i295 at appox 5:00am 3\27\12. i saw fairly low in the sky what looked like white squigly shaped 'clouds' in a north to south direction and relatively short in length. plus they seemed to be brighter than a cloud should be. suddenly i saw a dull white light heading south next to the existing 'clouds', and it was leaving a trail that was identical to the other 'clouds' and went for the same length as the others. the light disappeared and showed up next to that 'cloud' and repeated making another squigly shaped 'cloud' and together there was five of these 'clouds' when the activity stopped and i continued traveling towards hartford,ct on rte. 6. i observed this for appox. 15 minutes.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Johnston
There were no other sightings in Johnston on or around March 27th 2012
